item.title: Virtual Linux Remote Desktop
item.description: Have you ever wanted a persistent Linux virtual desktop that you could host anywhere and access remotely? Now you can do it, using only Ubuntu and a cheap VPS! I like having deterministic work environments. Disaster recovery becomes a cinch when you can just destroy and rebuild your desktop container, map your home directory back in, and continue working. How it Works There are remote desktop packages that can operate on top of a purely software X window stack.
